body_html:
The demo app applies a low-pass filter to the outputs.
https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/contrib/lite/java/demo/app/src/main/java/com/example/android/tflitecamerademo/ImageClassifier.java#L134

When outputs of TFLite interpreter are changed, the displayed values are changed gradually. This prevents the case that one bad frame makes the UI jumpy (e.g. 98% -> 0% -> 99%).

The logic isn't in TFLite interpreter. You're free to change the code to disable the logic. If you get the values from TFLite interpreter directly is should be fine.

Closing since this is working as intended.

The logic isn't in TFLite interpreter. You're free to change the code to disable the logic. If you get the values from TFLite interpreter directly is should be fine.

body:
The demo app applies a low-pass filter to the outputs. 
https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/contrib/lite/java/demo/app/src/main/java/com/example/android/tflitecamerademo/ImageClassifier.java#L134

When outputs of TFLite interpreter are changed, the displayed values are changed gradually. This prevents the case that one bad frame makes the UI jumpy (e.g. 98% -> 0% -> 99%). 

The logic isn't in TFLite interpreter. You're free to change the code to disable the logic. If you get the values from TFLite interpreter directly is should be fine. 

Closing since this is working as intended.
